nova_syndicate.name: Nova Syndicate
nova_syndicate.description: A ruthless corporation specializing in illicit pre-war technology. Their freighters are slow but heavily armed.

star_serpents.name: Star Serpents
star_serpents.description: Daring pirates and smugglers known for their lightning-fast blockade runs and hit-and-run tactics.

aetherian_guild.name: Aetherian Guild
aetherian_guild.description: A mysterious collective of explorers and information brokers who trade in secrets and rare materials.

solstice_traders.name: Solstice Traders
solstice_traders.description: Independent merchants and prospectors focused on rebuilding trade routes and galactic commerce.

the_void_port.name: The Void Port
the_void_port.description: A neutral deep-space station, a haven for smugglers, bounty hunters, and those avoiding the corporate war.
